こよなく愛する: (こよなくあいする) - to love greatly; to love beyond all else

こらえ性: (こらえしょう) - endurance; perseverance; patience

こりゃ: (こりゃ) - (from これは) hey there; I say; see here
これ: (これ) - (used to get the attention of one's equals or inferiors) hey; oi; yo
これから先: (これからさき) - from now on; in the future; hereafter; ahead of us; down the road
これっ切り: (これっきり) - last time (as of now)/never again; only this
これでも: (これでも) - even though things may appear this way

これでもかと言うほど: (これでもかというほど) - as if it weren't already enough
これで勝つる: (これでかつる) - victory is mine; with this, I'll win
これと同じ: (これとおなじ) - the same as this
これと言った: (これといった) - nothing special (with neg. verb)
これと言って: (これといって) - not worth mentioning (with neg. verb); nothing special
これより: (これより) - from (this, here, etc.); since (this)
これより三役: (これよりさんやく) - {sumo} final three bouts on the last day of a tournament
これより先: (これよりさき) - ahead/further on/beyond (this place); before this/prior to this/earlier
これを以て: (これをもって) - with this I (formal); by this I (formal)
これを書いている時点で: (これをかいているじてんで) - at the time of writing
これ位: (これぐらい) - this much; this amount

ころ: (ころ) - roller; runner; dried whale blubber
ころころ: (korokoro) - lightly rolling (de uma coisa pequena e redonda); pleasant, high-pitched sound (e.g. bell, young woman's laughter); changing frequently (e.g. conversation, plans), (occurring) in rapid succession (e.g. sumo wrestlers being defeated), fickly, in a fickle manner; roly-poly
ころっと: (korotto) - sound of something small rolling once (often into a hole); easily; suddenly; completely (por exemplo, esquecer), utterly
ころり: (ころり) - easily/effortlessly/suddenly/utterly; changing completely; plink (sound of something light falling or rolling)
ころんころん: (ころんころん) - lightly rolling (of a small and round thing); pleasant, high-pitched sound (e.g. bell, young woman's laughter); changing frequently (e.g. conversation, plans)/(occurring) in rapid succession (e.g. sumo wrestlers being defeated)/fickly/in a fickle manner; roly-poly; chirp chirp/sound of insects; ribbit ribbit/croak croak; (ころころ, コロコロ only)  roller/lint roller/paint roller
